meanings.definition: To transmit a radio or television program for public reception.
meanings.sent1: The radio station will broadcast the news at noon.
meanings.sent2: They broadcasted the live concert on TV last night.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally broadcasted my singing in the shower to the whole neighborhood!
meanings.sent4: Her smile broadcasted her happiness to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse broadcasted its light across the stormy sea.

meanings.sent1: I enjoy listening to the morning broadcast on the radio.
meanings.sent2: The TV broadcast of the game was exciting to watch.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed fascinated by the broadcast of birds chirping on TV.
meanings.sent4: The broadcast of laughter from the sitcom filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The radio broadcast of the weather report helped us plan our day.
